job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: Big Data, Hadoop on Data Warehousing or Data Integration projects. Analysis, Design, development, support and Enhancements of ETL/ELT in data warehouse environment with Cloudera Bigdata Technologies Writing Hadoop/Hive/Impala scripts for gathering stats on table post data loads. Development experience creating Sqoop scripts, PySpark programs, HDFS commands, HDFS file formats, StreamSets pipeline creation, jobs scheduling, etc. Strong SQL experience (Oracle and Hadoop (Hive/Impala etc.)).
